215390=King biding his time — 8/6/2007, from UGASports.com, 236980=UGA's Top 10 Questions for Fall Camp — 7/5/2006, from UGASports.com, 201782=2003 (Freshman): Played in 11 games as true freshman and finished as the team's second leading rusher with 433 yards on 85 carries....after missing the first two games of the season with a hamstring injury has gradually emerged as one of the Bulldogs' top threats out of the backfield.....Georgia's leading rusher against Alabama, Auburn, Georgia Tech and LSU in the SEC Championship game.....has scored six TDs this season (five rushing and one receiving) to tie Michael Cooper for team-high touchdown honors.....broke free from a pile in the middle of the line to scamper 22 yards around left end for Georgia's final TD in the win at Tennessee.....scored on a 16-yard jaunt on third-and-goal against Auburn to put the Dogs up 19-0.....the only Bulldog to rush and receive for a TD in the same game this season when he did so at Georgia Tech......earned
